name: Untitled Town Building Game
description:
In this game you create your own town filled with placeholder objects and incomplete features. There is a day/night cycle, however it gets very dark during the night and no buildings give off light yet. As of version 0.2.1, most features are not in the game.  We are looking to expand this game and improve it as time goes on.

Known Bugs v0.2.1

  • You cannot save your town
  • The butcher is broken
  • Pausing the game makes you unable to build
  • The camera can get lost out of bounds if you move it far enough away
  • Camera movement is sometimes jittery
